turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi. how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, I'm looking to place a pick-up order from pizzeria called Bella Luna. Can you help me?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i definitely can. what did you want to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Looking for two large chicken barbecue pizzas but they have to have both be with a with a gluten-free crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it, did you need anything else?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: the order for 2 large bbq chicken, both with gluten free crust is $35.39.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: should i place the order now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, that sounds pretty good. Please go ahead.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: awesome. i'll place the order now and sent the receipt to you via text.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you need help with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's it, thank you so much.
